select id,text,fatherId,iconCls,leaf as menuLeaf,link,seq,
isnull(isModify,0) as isModify,isnull(isAdd,0)as isAdd,isnull(isDel,0)as isDel,isnull(isSee,0)as isSee from t_system_menu where flag=1 order by seq asc

select t.id,t.text,t.fatherId,t.iconCls,t.leaf as menuLeaf,t.link,t.seq, isnull(k.isModify,0) as isModify,isnull(k.isAdd,0)as isAdd,isnull(k.isDel,0)as isDel,isnull(k.isSee,0)as isSee from t_system_menu t left join (select * from t_system_user_page_right where userId= #{userId}) k on t.id=k.menuId where exists( select m.id,m.text,m.fatherId,m.iconCls,m.leaf ,m.link,m.seq,r.isModify,r.isAdd,r.isDel,r.isSee from t_system_user_page_right r inner join t_system_menu m on r.menuId = m.id where r.userId = #{userId} and m.flag=1 and t.id in (m.id,m.fatherId) )
